idea:
We provide personalized strategies that take into account all aspects of your financial goals and offer guidance, clarity of thought, and expertise to help you gain confidence in a more secure financial future.

we act as a valued partner who can help tie your investment plan to your overall life plan. Not only can we provide you with guidance, counseling, monitoring and discipline, but we can also be a valued catalyst to encourage you to plan for the expected…and unexpected. We work as your partner, providing you with counsel on an ongoing basis.
name: TAKHT FINANCIAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Life Gracious is a first-of-its-kind company to provide comprehensive solutions for home-style food (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snacks & Fruits) delivered fresh & hot through a sophisticated high end delivery service to your doorstep. Life Gracious also offers a hassle-free Laundry & Drycleaning experience, Nutrition Programs, Yoga Classes, Home Visit of Doctors, HouseKeeping Services and comprehensive Wellness Program. We have partnered with some of the best kitchens in the country. Our utmost emphasis is to deliver the best quality product both in terms of taste and safety. All our kitchens have robust quality assurance teams which are engaged in monitoring the complete food handling process with special focus on hygiene and quality. All products and processes are monitored right from the receiving of raw materials till the final product delivery. Regular audits are conducted for strict adherence to the processes & outcome. Life Gracious is a first-of-its-kind premium food service for individuals & families which offers complete food solutions for people’s daily food needs of 3 meals everyday including Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner and snacks & fruits delivered fresh & hot through a sophisticated hi-end delivery service to their doorsteps. At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting the home-services industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. This way, experiences meet technology, and we combine multiple services essential to any household to create the most productive and satisfying experiences for our customers.
name: LIFE GRACIOUS SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
With the world witnessing a paradigm shift in the education sector, it has become essential to recruit talented individuals. However, the task is quite daunting!

To make recruitment simpler and ensure all educational institutes have the best talents at their disposal, we at Eduvacancy are striving hard to streamline the interview screening and job market process at both ends, that is, for both the candidate and hiring manager.

Our USP lies in our humanistic approach aimed at saving both time and money. Throughout the process, we ensure to provide a personal experience by crafting unique, compelling videos that paper resumes often fail to provide.

At Eduvacancy, we believe that all educational institutes must be empowered with a proper workforce for the betterment of the nation.
name: ASSIGNEDGE NETWORK PRIVATE LIMITED
